3: Everyone, we've reached the coordinates of the weapon supplies—ah, this is...
The Constructs here are all blown to pieces, and paint is all over their body parts.
Have... they come to... destroy my... work again...?
Lee kneels, then touches and checks the graffiti with his fingers.
Composes mostly of Construct vital fluids... with a mixture of industrial coloring, fluorescent agents, and mixed coolants.
...Looks like they aren't using Construct fluids just to paint these horrid-looking graffiti, but also as a weapon.
H-horrid...? That imbecile... He's saying my work is... horrid...
Yes, a weapon. What blew up these Constructs is likely a bomb made from pressurized paint.
These bombs would cause an almost instantaneous drop in temperature after its explosion, slowing down the affected targets.

2: Seems like it's learning and evolving.

3: Indeed. They go to such disgusting lengths to fight against humanity.
You really cannot expect even an ounce of conscience in the Corrupted...
There's no peace to be made between us... Liv, is the area scan complete?
Yes! The Levi-Gun parts the supply squad mentioned is nearby.
